snippet.title: Monochrome Valentine Trailer
snippet.description:
"It tends to hit us by surprise, doesn't it? When a relationship ends, our lives can change so drastically. This is the story of Blake Lawrence and his chance encounter with the endlessly positive, Selena."

A free visual novel made for the 2021 Valentine's VN Jam.

https://zankizuna.itch.io/monochrome-valentine

We have a few more updates and fixes planned in the coming months. Keep up to date on our MonoVal dev blog here:
https://twitter.com/MonoValDev

Credits:

Lead Dev, Sprite, CG and Item Art -Raseruuu
1st story concept,  characters-Jmac857
Outline/story/script -Dusk-Spark
CG assistance/Dusk-wrangler - Kathana-DA
Programming, UI Layout and Speech Bubbles Layout -Jeroz
Music - Alcaknight, and Maoudamashii
Comic-style Speech Bubble UI Code - Remix
Proofreading - Zon Dantès
Some speech bubble assets by Mangoku418
Background Art - Konett, Studio Senpai, Kimagure After, and Noraneko Games
